336d898217ee.description: Our community publishes stories worth reading on development, design, and data science.
336d898217ee.shortDescription: Our community publishes stories worth reading on…

paragraphs.name: 7a11
paragraphs.text: He encouraged me to read, travel, practice listening, fail quickly, engage the world, embrace diversity, and hone my craft. “Challenge yourself to learn eclectic and varied skills and have fun in the process.”

paragraphs.name: d0cf
paragraphs.text: Returning from the camping trip, I thought about how I could be a better leader at the company I started, Pennybox.
“Be the change that you wish to see in the world.” — Mahatma Gandhi

paragraphs.name: bfbb
paragraphs.text: “Imagine a world in which people embrace change, strive to create new markets, never stop learning, and are constantly investing in future skills. This is the kind of world I want to live in.”

paragraphs.text: ~That is the kind of world I want to live in too!

df892afd9b4d.title: I visited your website and I am so glad that you have taken the initiative of teaching kids the…

paragraphs.name: 6d92
paragraphs.text: I visited your website and I am so glad that you have taken the initiative of teaching kids the value of money.
However, I find it so wrong that you should attach a monetary value to a household chore, I feel that creating such a model will only make the child selfish or opportunist.

paragraphs.text: Hi Adam…I’ve just read your post and found it inspirational. I also read your backstory about Pennybox. I work with startups and small businesses, in the UK and Europe to help accelerate success. I’d love to use both articles as the main subject in one of my weekly newsletters. Would you be prepared to add a personal note to the newsletter? Just a…
